hero.title: Juan José Burbano
hero.subtitle: Building robust, secure, and scalable software
hero.description: Software Engineering student focused on developing high-level backend solutions, with a focus on software architecture, DevOps, and cloud computing. Passionate about creating robust, scalable, and efficient systems.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm a Software Engineering student passionate about developing robust, scalable, and secure solutions. I focus on software architecture, backend development with Java, and the integration of quality and observability practices to ensure reliable and maintainable code.
about.description2: My career goal is to become a software architect, with a strong focus on cybersecurity and the application of best practices in software engineering.
about.description3: "Programmers know the benefits of everything and the trade-offs of nothing. Architects need to understand both."

scheduler.title: Electronic Medical Records and Appointment Management System
scheduler.description: A system for clinics that includes patient registration, medical history, appointment scheduling, notifications, digital document signing, and medical record uploading via AWS. It includes security with Spring Security.

pos.title: Supermarket POS System
pos.description: Complete application for sales management, inventory, and billing with detailed reports.

landing.title: Landing Page - Construction Materials
landing.description: Modern and responsive website for a construction materials store.

javaUdemyCert.title: Complete Java Course: From Zero to Master
